knimeNode.name: PBAC Scorer
knimeNode.shortDescription: All in one node that calculates/updates the PBAC Score.

fullDescription.intro:
This node contains the default Prototype Based Active Classification (PBAC) implementation.
For more information on PBAC see Active Learning for object classification: from exploration to exploitation (Cebron et al., 2009)
fullDescription.option: The weighting factor between exploration and exploitation.
The radius alpha parameter for the node potential portion of PBAC.
The number of neighbors considered by the kNN learner.
The column containing the class labels in the second input table.
